description.full: Turn down the lights, crank up the amps and prepare to command center stage with some of the most famous AND infamous Guitar Hero® tracks. Using all the Guitar Hero® World Tour controllers strum, drum, and belt out some of your favorite tracks from Guitar Hero®, Guitar Hero® II, Guitar Hero® Rock the 80’s, and Guitar Hero® III: Legends of Rock. Rock out to music from Nirvana, Judas Priest, Slayer, Queen, and many more master tracks.
